NK037(ji)021:0: chos skyong rnams kyi srog gtad rjes gnang la bka' bsgo dgos pa'i dper brjod ni /
NK037(ji)021:2: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las kyi mngag gzhug chen po /
NK037(ji)021:3: bstan pa dam pa'i chos skyong ba'i srung ma 'di zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis /
NK037(ji)021:4: rtsa ba dang brgyud par bcas pa'i dpal ldan bla
NK037(ji)021:5: ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' dang dam las ma
NK037(ji)021:6: 'da' bar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srungs /
NK037(ji)021:9: chos mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan tshugs /
NK037(ji)021:10: bla ma dam pa'i sku tshe dang phrin las spel /
NK037(ji)021:11: bstan pa bstan 'dzin dang bcas la rim gro skyed /
NK037(ji)021:12: sems can gyi phan bde spel /
NK037(ji)021:14: gdug pa can gyi bsam sbyor ngan pa thams cad rgyun chod /
NK037(ji)021:15: khyad par du yang rdo rje'i slob ma 'di nyid
NK037(ji)021:16: dus deng nas bzung byang chub kyi bar du khyod
NK037(ji)021:18: lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'grogs nas /
NK037(ji)021:19: sngon gyi las dang 'phral gyi rkyen las byung ba'i /
NK037(ji)021:20: rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa las gyur pa dang /
NK037(ji)021:21: 'go nad yams rims sogs nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i gnod pa thams cad zhi ba dang /
NK037(ji)021:22: lha klu gnod sbyin gza' dang rgyal po la sogs
NK037(ji)021:23: gdon rigs sum brgya drug cu'i gnod pa thams cad
NK037(ji)021:24: zhi ba dang / rmi lam mtshan ma ngan pa
NK037(ji)021:25: sogs bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad zhi
NK037(ji)021:26: zhing bzlog par mdzad du gsol /
NK037(ji)021:27: tshe dang bsod nams dpal dang 'byor ba sogs legs
NK037(ji)021:28: tshogs kyi dngos po thams cad 'phel zhing rgyal par
NK037(ji)021:29: mdzad du gsol / khyad par du yang sems can
NK037(ji)021:30: thams cad kyi don du phyag rgya chen po'i dngos
NK037(ji)021:31: grub sgrub pa'i gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi phyi
NK037(ji)021:32: nang gsang ba'i 'gal rkyen mtha' dag sol /
NK037(ji)021:33: mthun rkyen thams cad yid bzhin du sgrub pa'i grogs gyis /
NK037(ji)021:37: yid la bsam pa'i don thams cad bde blag tu 'grub pa dang /
NK037(ji)021:38: mthar thug phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub la yang dag par sbyor cig /
NK037(ji)021:41: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub bde blag tu sgrubs shig /
NK037(ji)021:42: ces bka' bsgos pas don de dag re re nas
NK037(ji)021:43: de bzhin du bagyi'o zhes spro ba bcas pas khas
NK037(ji)021:44: blangs par bsam / yang bka' bsgo'i ngag 'don mdor bsdu na /
NK037(ji)021:45: dpal ye shes kyi mgon po legs ldan tshogs kyi
NK037(ji)021:46: bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis chos sku
NK037(ji)021:47: kun tu bzang po zhes sogs brgyud pa'i gshar kha
NK037(ji)021:48: barjesa / bar du byon pa'i rtsa ba dang brgyud
NK037(ji)021:49: par bcas pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka'
NK037(ji)021:51: spyir sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srungs /
NK037(ji)021:53: dge 'dun dang chos kyi rgyal srid skyongs /
NK037(ji)021:56: gdug pa can gyi gnya' non /
NK037(ji)021:57: dam tshig can gyi stong grogs mdzod /
NK037(ji)021:59: phan sems can gyi phrin las sgrubs /
NK037(ji)021:60: khyad par rdo rje'i slob ma'am rigs kyi bu 'di'i sdang ba'i dgra thul /
NK037(ji)021:65: dbang phyug dang gzi brjid skyed /
NK037(ji)021:66: chos nor dang longs spyod spel /
NK037(ji)021:67: mnga' ris dang chos srid skyongs /
NK037(ji)021:68: dngos grub kyi bsam pa sgrubs /
NK037(ji)021:69: phrin las kyi re ba skongs /
NK037(ji)021:70: mdor na byang chub ma thob kyi bar du lus
NK037(ji)021:71: dang grib ma bzhin du 'grogs te phun sum tshogs
NK037(ji)021:72: pa'i bsam sbyor thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i
NK037(ji)021:73: phrin las g.yel med du sgrub par mdzod cig /
